data.title: Business Management Studies at the University of New Mexico :: Anderson School of Management
data.meta_description: Study business at the University of New Mexico's Anderson School of Management. Our AACSB-accredited business management studies can help you advance at a pace that works for you.
data.text:
Unleash Your Potential with Business Management Studies

The Anderson School of Management at The University of New Mexico is one of the elite 6% of business schools worldwide to hold AACSB accreditation. We offer high-quality business management studies at all skill and experience levels, including undergraduate business degrees, graduate business degrees, certificates, skills development courses and executive leadership programs. Anderson courses offer a unique value in their high quality and accessible pricing, with face-to-face and online options during the day, evenings and weekends.
